name: Titan Crisis
description:
The radar system screams to life, something huge is out there. Scrambling into your fighter jet to meet this strange object you fly over the horizon to see massive monsters, destroying everything in their path. It is your mission to beat back these horrific monsters with the weapons you have at your disposal.

This version of the game, styled after classic game systems like the Atari and Intellivision is free for everyone to try out, but over on our Patreon you can pick up the HD version of this game, witch has HD pre-rendered graphics and extra features. All our other mini-games are also available free with the subscription. As well as get access to beta versions of these and larger games we are working on.
